alert.note: Alert for Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 04 at 1:08AM CST until January 04 at 1:45AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wilcox County in south central Alabama... * Until 145 AM CST. * At 107 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Vineland, or 7 miles northeast of Thomasville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Camden, Pine Hill and Yellow Bluff. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for south central and southwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for south central and southwestern Alabama.
